title: Strong Current Account Balance
description: In 2023, Kuwait's current account balance was 31.40% of GDP, indicating a robust surplus compared to other nations.

title: High Water Stress Levels
description: As of 2021, Kuwait's freshwater withdrawal was 3850.5% of its available resources, highlighting significant water stress challenges.

title: Universal Internet Access for Women
description: In 2023, 100% of the female population in Kuwait used the internet, showcasing excellent digital inclusivity.

title: Negative Tax Revenue
description: In 2023, Kuwait reported a negative value of -$10.67 billion in taxes less subsidies on products, indicating fiscal challenges.

title: Stable Exchange Rate
description: Kuwait maintained a stable official exchange rate of 0.3067 LCU per US$ in 2024, reflecting currency stability.

title: Efficient Sanitation Services
description: By 2022, 100% of Kuwait's population had access to safely managed sanitation services, ensuring public health and hygiene.

title: Low Vulnerable Employment for Women
description: In 2023, only 0.02% of female employment in Kuwait was considered vulnerable, indicating strong job security for women.

title: Youthful Male Population
description: In 2023, 4.20% of Kuwait's male population was aged 20-24, reflecting a youthful demographic.

title: Mature Male Workforce
description: In 2023, 13.04% of Kuwait's male population was aged 40-44, indicating a mature and experienced workforce.
